lines.text: Doctor, it's after one o'clock and you're having Miss Molly Byrd for lunch.
Awww... she's too tough. Get me some lamb chops!
Don't you know that if you tell lies you'll never get to heaven?
I'm not particularly anxious to get to heaven - on account of the trouble I'd have in getting my shirt on over my wings.
Oh, don't worry about that, Leonard. Your trouble is going to be getting your pants on over your tail.
I always knew men angels would have red hair.
I didn't know there were ten doctors as smart as I am.
Look, Red, I admit that girl isn't exactly repulsive. But anything she's good at I can do better, quicker, and cheaper.
